name: The White Rose - in Nazi Germany
name_original: The White Rose - in Nazi Germany
description:
Travel back to the 1940s and help combat Nazi Propaganda.

Share leaflets cliticizing Hitler's Government, but don't get caught by the NAZI police!

Can you drop all the leaflets and survive?

---

View NAZI Propaganda Posters leading up to, and during, World War II (translated into English).

Inspired by the true story of The White Rose (Weiße Rose) leaflets in NAZI Germany.
